Detailed Description

Class that encapsulates a popup menu that contains DzActionMenuItems.

See also:
DzActionMgr::getMenu(), DzPane::getOptionsMenu()

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzActionMenu::DzActionMenu (  ) 

Default Constructor.

DzActionMenu::DzActionMenu ( MenuType  type  ) 

Creates a new action menu with the given type, and adds the applicable actions if the type is PaneMenu, ViewToolMenu, or SaveAsMenu.

Parameters:
type The type of menu
DzActionMenu::DzActionMenu ( const DzActionMenu &  menu  ) 

Copy Constructor. Creates a new action menu that is a deep copy of the given menu.

Parameters:
menu The menu to create a copy of.
DzActionMenu::~DzActionMenu (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

void DzActionMenu::buildMenu ( QMenu *  menu  )  [protected, virtual]

Rebuilds the menu by clearing the given menu and then inserting all action items for this menu.

Parameters:
menu The QMenu that this action menu should add its items to.
void DzActionMenu::clear (  )  [slot]

Removes all items from the menu.

Displays the menu to the user

Displays the menu to the user at the given position.

Parameters:
pos The global window coordinates at which to display the popup menu.

Parameters:
name The name of the submenu to find.
Returns:
A pointer to the submenu with the given name, NULL if no submenu with the name is found.

Parameters:
which The index of the item to return.
Returns:
A pointer to the menu item at the given index, NULL if the index is invalid
QObjectList DzActionMenu::getItemList (  )  const [slot]

This function is provided for DAZ Script access. Plug-in developers are encouraged to use the much more efficient itemListIterator() method.

Returns:
A QObjectList of all the items in this menu.
QMenu * DzActionMenu::getMenu (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
A pointer to the QMenu used by this action menu.
int DzActionMenu::getNumItems (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The number of items in the menu
DzActionMenu * DzActionMenu::getSubMenu ( const QString &  name  )  [slot]
Parameters:
name The name of the submenu to get.
Returns:
A pointer to a submenu with the given name - if one does not already exist, it is created, and added to the end of the menu.
bool DzActionMenu::hasItems (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if there are items in this menu, false if the menu is empty.
void DzActionMenu::insertAction ( const QString &  action,
int  at = -1 
) [slot]

Inserts the given action into the menu at the given location.

Parameters:
action The class name of the action to insert into the menu
at The index at which to insert the item, if the index is invalid (the default) the item is appended to the end of the menu.
void DzActionMenu::insertCustomAction ( const QString &  action,
int  at = -1 
) [slot]

Inserts the given custom action into the menu at the given location.

Parameters:
action The name of the custom action to insert into the menu
at The index at which to insert the item, if the index is invalid (the default) the item is appended to the end of the menu.
void DzActionMenu::insertDomElem ( QDomElement &  elem,
int  at = -1 
)

Generates a new menu item from the DOM (Document Object Model) element. This is used for building menus from XML. This function is intended for internal use, and so is not supported as part of the SDK.

Parameters:
elem The DOM element which defines this menu.
at The index at which to insert the item, if the index is invalid (the default) the item is appended to the end of the menu.
void DzActionMenu::insertItem ( DzActionMenuItem *  item,
int  at = -1 
) [slot]

Inserts the given item into the menu at the given location.

Parameters:
item The item to insert into the menu
at The index at which to insert the item, if the index is invalid (the default) the item is appended to the end of the menu.
void DzActionMenu::insertMenu ( const QString &  text,
DzActionMenu *  menu,
int  at = -1 
) [slot]

Inserts the given menu into the menu at the given location as a submenu.

Parameters:
text The text to display in this menu for the submenu item
menu The submenu to insert into this menu
at The index at which to insert the item, if the index is invalid (the default) the item is appended to the end of the menu.
void DzActionMenu::insertSeparator ( int  at = -1  )  [slot]

Inserts a separator into the menu at the given location.

Parameters:
at The index at which to insert the item, if the index is invalid (the default) the item is appended to the end of the menu.
DzActionMenu::itemListChanged (  )  [signal]

Emitted when items are added to or removed from this menu

DzActionMenuIterator DzActionMenu::itemListIterator (  )  const
Returns:
An iterator for the items in the menu. If you want to iterate over all the items in the menu, using this function is the most efficient.
void DzActionMenu::removeItem ( DzActionMenuItem *  item  )  [slot]

Remove the given item from the menu.

Parameters:
item The item to remove from the menu
void DzActionMenu::saveMenu ( QDomDocument &  doc,
QDomElement &  parent 
) const

Adds the DOM representation of this menu, and its submenus to the DOM document as a child of the given element. This function is intended for internal use, and is not supported as a part of the SDK.

Parameters:
doc The document to save the menu to.
parent The element in the document that this menu's data will be made a child of.
void DzActionMenu::simplifySeparators (  )  [slot]

Removes any duplicate separators from the menu by replacing multiple separators with a single separator.

The type of the action menu.
